LanguageData.ghostlycrying_sound.label: Ghost's cry
LanguageData.ghostlycrying_sound.description: A spear-type weapon imbued with a heroic spirit. It looks like an ordinary spear, but the moment it is stabbed, something that dwells in the spear flows in and shows an unknown hallucination.
LanguageData.ghostlycrying_sound.tools.0.label: blade
LanguageData.ghostlycrying_sound.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.Ghost_Singing_Window.label: Ghost Singing Window
LanguageData.Ghost_Singing_Window.description: A polearm imbued with a heroic spirit. While stabbing quickly with a spear, it also inflicts a mental attack on the enemy for hallucinations.
LanguageData.Ghost_Singing_Window.tools.0.label: blade
LanguageData.Ghost_Singing_Window.tools.1.label: point

LanguageData.Wolf_Longsword.label: Wolf long sword
LanguageData.Wolf_Longsword.description: The wolf longsword is the main weapon used by demons. It is mainly used because it is lightweight and easy to use while lowering the mental blockage.
LanguageData.Wolf_Longsword.tools.0.label: blade

LanguageData.Wolf_Claymore.label: Wolf claymore
LanguageData.Wolf_Claymore.description: Wolf Claymore is one of the two-handed swords used by demons called Blood Knights among the hakuros demon race. Wolf Claymore is slow, but it shows critical damage, and the built-in jewel lowers the demon's mental block.

LanguageData.Wolf_flame_Claymore.description: The enhanced wolf claymore. Wolf fire claymore is a flaming sword, burning enemies it touches.
LanguageData.Wolf_flame_Claymore.tools.0.label: blade

LanguageData.Blood_Axe.label: Twin axes of blood
LanguageData.Blood_Axe.description: A double axe that bleeds. A weapon that slaughters enemies with a sharp, bleeding axe that reduces hunger for blood.
LanguageData.Blood_Axe.tools.0.label: blade

LanguageData.Blood_Scythe.label: Scythe of blood
LanguageData.Blood_Scythe.description: It's a scythe-shaped weapon that drips blood. A weapon that lusts for the blood of enemies. Slashes enemies with sharp scythes, increasing the essence of their blood, but slowly eating away at their inner spirit.

LanguageData.Blood_Scythe.tools.1.label: handle
